tool.name: OGS: generateMatPropsFromMatID
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'generateMatPropsFromMatID'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; generateMatPropsFromMatID #if str($mesh).strip() != 'None' and str($mesh).strip() != '': --mesh '$mesh.element_identifier' #end if

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: Input (.msh). The mesh to open from a file

tool.help: This tool runs the **generateMatPropsFromMatID** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
